entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Composite CG2 systemically fails to resolve certain generic instantiations #64170
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get info about generic attributes #64169
  • createdump fails with libunwind assert: Assertion `ip >= di->start_ip && ip < di->end_ip' failed. #64168
  • Console.ReadLine on Ubuntu in WSL disables echo of characters when cancelled with Ctrl-C #64166
  • API Proposal: Add `ref` field feature support to `RuntimeFeature` class #64165
    7.0.0
  • GC's VXSort question #64164
  • NativeAOT ignores dependency's changes #64163
  • GitHub_17777 test failing on linux-arm64 #64162
  • JIT: Assert "Missing flags on tree" #64161
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #64159
  • build-runtime.cmd on fresh clone fails #64156
  • system.diagnostics.tests.providermetadatatests.getprovidernames_assertproperties #64153
  • .NET 6 Crash in UnlockedLoaderHeap::GetMoreCommittedPages (loaderheap.cpp) #64152

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: One shot hashing of `Stream` #62489
  • System.Reflection.Metadata does not allow RVA mapped fields to be reliably aligned to 8 byte boundaries #62313
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 does not reliably align data used by CreateSpan<T> #62316
    7.0.0
  • IL Tools: Add `ilsub` and create nuget package for it #5276
    Future
  • TypeBuilder::CreateTypeInfo() should not throw COMException #43282
    7.0.0
  • system.diagnostics.tests.providermetadatatests.getprovidernames_assertproperties #64155
  • system.diagnostics.tests.providermetadatatests.getprovidernames_assertproperties #64154
  • PrincipalContext.Dispose() does not dispose LdapConnection(s) used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials() #62035

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ref field runtime feature indication #64167
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.0
  • Use stable outputs in illink targets #64160
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove usage of codecvt from corerun #64157
    community-contribution
  • Title and message resources should be enforced to exist to prevent printing empty messages #64151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement hash and HMAC stream one shots #63757
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Add alignment to mapped field stream #63305
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Update NativeAOT codegen and Crossgen2 for CreateSpan #63977
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Spmi replay asmdiffs mac os arm64 #64119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Clone ADDR(LCL) for DUP #64171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
